attributes.action: name the two new royal navy aircraft carriers HMS Churchill &HMS Roosevelt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the spirit of enduring transatlantic co-operation, and to commemorate two of the greatest statesmen of the 20th century, we suggest that the new Royal Navy aircraft carriers be named HMS Churchill & HMS Roosevelt, and that the carrier named Roosevelt has a permanent U.S. Navy cadre on board
